code: var BASE_URL="https://api.coinpaprika.com/v1";export function fetchCoins(){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/coins")).then(function(response){return response.json();});}export function fetchCoinInfo(coinId){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/coins/").concat(coinId)).then(function(response){return response.json();});}export function fetchCoinTickers(coinId){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/tickers/").concat(coinId)).then(function(response){return response.json();});}export function fetchCoinHistory(coinId){var endDate=Math.floor(Date.now()/1000);var startDate=endDate-60*60*24*7*2;return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/coins/").concat(coinId,"/ohlcv/historical?start=").concat(startDate,"&end=").concat(endDate)).then(function(response){return response.json();});}export function fetchCoinPrcice(coinId){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/ticker/").concat(coinId)).then(function(response){return response.json();});}
